import React, {useState} from 'react' import Button from './Button' export default function Details(props) { const [active, setActive] = useState(false) const [blue,setBlue] = useState("") const [color,setColor] = useState("Pink") function handleClick(e) { // console.log(e.target.className.includes('active')); console.log(e.target.name) setActive(!active) setColor(e.target.name) setBlue('active') // color? {color}: "Pink" } return (

{props.item.price}

{props.item.name}

{props.item.description}

Color : {color}
01
) }
